summary: A man accidentally gets into a time machine and travels back in time nearly an hour. Finding himself will be the first of a series of disasters of unforeseeable consequences.
cast: Karra Elejalde|Candela Fernández|Bárbara Goenaga|Nacho Vigalondo|Juan Inciarte
keywords: time machine|car crashing into a tree|hair cutting|ladder|scissors
title: Los cronocrímenes
